name: DONT'STOP:THE ROBOT
description:
Tyler Durden, a famous scientist of the planet Eurotis invented an AI robot that gives its life to protect the world.Eurotis is a peaceful world until that day. Eurotis neighbour planet exploded and the planet debris are coming towards Eurotis.the planet has no defence against it. Its only hope is 'Don't stop'.

you play as don't stop the robot.

use arrow keys to move.

mouse to aim

and left mouse button to shoot.

we are counting on you!!!!
